data.title: Here and Now (1970 film)
data.meta_description: Here and Now is a 1970 French-Canadian film directed by Denis Héroux. The film is seen as a sequel to Valérie also directed by Héroux. The film has been called maple syrup porn. L’Initiation grossed more money than its predecessor, making it one of the highest-grossing Canadian films at the domestic box office.
